Class SequenceAligner

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.asu.zoophy.rest.pipeline.SequenceAligner

  • public class SequenceAligner
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for aligning sequences into FASTA format
    Author:
    devdemetri

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<GenBankRecord> align(java.util.List<java.lang.String> accessions, boolean isTest)
      Sequence Alignment Pipeline that runs: 1) Geoname Disjoiner 2) GLM Predictor Generator (only if job is using GLM) 3) FASTA formatting of raw sequences 4) MAFFT sequence alignment

      Generate raw FASTA for downlaods

    • Method Detail

      • align

        public java.util.List<GenBankRecord> align(java.util.List<java.lang.String> accessions,
                                           boolean isTest)
                                    throws PipelineException
        Sequence Alignment Pipeline that runs: 1) Geoname Disjoiner 2) GLM Predictor Generator (only if job is using GLM) 3) FASTA formatting of raw sequences 4) MAFFT sequence alignment
        Parameters:
        accessions - - record sequences to be included in FASTA
        isTest - - True iff actual alignment can be skipped for a test run
        Returns:
        Final List of Records to be used in the Job
        Throws:
        PipelineException

      • loadSequences

        public java.util.List<GenBankRecord> loadSequences(java.util.List<java.lang.String> accessions,
                                                   boolean isDisjoint,
                                                   boolean isUsingDefaultGLM)
                                            throws GenBankRecordNotFoundException,
                                                   DaoException,
                                                   PipelineException
        Loads GenBank Records that contain the desired sequences. This may also include running the GeonameDisjoiner
        Parameters:
        accessions - - records to load
        isDisjoint - - whether to run GeonameDisjoiner on the records or not
        Returns:
        list of GenBankRecords ready for MAFFT
        Throws:
        GenBankRecordNotFoundException
        DaoException
        PipelineException

        public java.lang.String generateDownloadableRawFasta(java.util.List<java.lang.String> accessions)

                                                     PipelineException
        Generate raw FASTA for downlaods
        Parameters:
        accessions -
        Returns:
        raw FASTA
        Throws:
        GenBankRecordNotFoundException
        DaoException
        PipelineException
